title: This Crypto Firm Is Buying 1,000 Bitcoins: Here's Why It Could Change Everything
description: K33, a Norway-based digital asset brokerage and research firm, has launched a directed share issue to raise at least SEK 85 million (approximately $8 million USD). The proceeds will be used to acquire up to 1,000 Bitcoin (CRYPTO: BTC) to hold on its balance s…
